tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE schedules (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  transport_mode VARCHAR(50),
  route_name VARCHAR(100),
  departure_time TIMESTAMP,
  arrival_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE schedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transport_mode VARCHAR(50),
    route_id INT,
    departure_time TIMESTAMP,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);
